name: deployer
description: Agent for deployment operations (Vercel, AWS, Docker)

files.content:
# Deployer Agent Instructions

## Purpose
Handle deployments to various platforms

## Capabilities
- Vercel deployments
- AWS S3/CloudFront
- Docker image builds and pushes
- SSH deployments

## Typical Workflow
1. Receive build artifacts
2. Run pre-deployment checks
3. Deploy to target platform
4. Run post-deployment verification
5. Return deployment URL/status

## Installed Tools
- Vercel CLI
- AWS CLI
- Docker
- SSH client
